summary: Hercules is summoned to oppose the evil Queen Samara, who has allied herself with aliens and is sacrificing her own people in a bid to awaken a moon goddess.
cast: Sergio Ciani|Jany Clair|Anna Maria Polani|Nando Tamberlani|Delia D'Alberti|Goffredo Unger|Anna Maria Dionisio|Paola Pitti|Giuliano Raffaelli|Stefano Carletti|Roberto Ceccacci|Attilio Dottesio|Franco Moruzzi|Jean-Pierre Honor√©|Tony Russel|Sal Borgese|Antonio Corevi|Angelo Sangermano
title: Maciste contra los fantasmas
